alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:41PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marin, Sonoma and Napa Counties through 445 PM PST... At 340 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster strong thunderstorms 17 miles west of Healdsburg, or 27 miles west of Santa Rosa, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Napa, Petaluma, Novato, Rohnert Park, Windsor, American Canyon, Healdsburg, Sonoma, Cloverdale, Sebastopol, Cotati, St. Helena, Calistoga, Black Point-Green Point, Point Reyes Station, Tomales, Roseland, South Santa Rosa Cdp and Larkfield-Wikiup. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
